Robert William Chapman may refer to:
* Robert William Chapman (engineer) (1866–1942), Australian mathematician and engineer
* Robert William Chapman (scholar) (1881–1960), British editor and book collector

Robert William Chapman (5 October 1881 in Eskbank, Scotland – 20 April 1960 in Oxford), usually known in print as R. W. Chapman, was a British scholar, book collector and editor of the works of Samuel Johnson and Jane Austen.
*Professor Robert William Chapman, of the University of Adelaide, President of the Astronomical Society and of other institutions in the State of South Australia
